commandDescription: Retrieve records from Salesforce to data files
deploydirFlagDescription: Directory containing the deployment descriptor 'datadeploy.json' (default: current working directory)
infoRetrievingRecordsToFile: → Retrieving records for sObject '%s' to file '%s'
errorRetrieveDataFailed: ✕ Failed to retrieve records for sObject '%s'. Error: %s
